languages.text: "Совершенно верно. Почтенный Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар объявил себя комендантом Простора Коронус и разослал требования по реквизиции войск. Свою ставку он разместил на Футфоле, как в наиболее логистически удобной точке. Оттуда его флот наносит удары по всему Простору, истребляя силы культа Последнего восхода и богомерзких друкари. Пожалуй, сейчас лишь он не дает Простору обратиться в пепел".

"Exactly. The esteemed Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has declared himself Warden of the Koronus Expanse and issued orders to requisition troops. He has made Footfall his base of operations, as it was the most logistically convenient point. From there, his fleet strikes throughout the Expanse, destroying the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. He may be all that currently stands in the way of the Expanse being reduced to ashes."
languages.original_text: "Совершенно верно. Почтенный Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар объявил себя комендантом Простора Коронус и разослал требования по реквизиции войск. Свою ставку он разместил на Футфоле, как в наиболее логистически удобной точке. Оттуда его флот наносит удары по всему Простору, истребляя силы культа Последнего восхода и богомерзких друкари. Пожалуй, сейчас лишь он не дает Простору обратиться в пепел".

traits.locale_text: "Exactly. The esteemed Lord Inquisitor Calcazar declared himself Commandant of the Koronus Expanse and sent out demands for troops he intended to requisition. He made Footfall his base of operations, which was the most logistically convenient choice. From there, his fleet has been striking throughout the Expanse, decimating the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. At the moment, he is probably all that stands in the way of the Expanse being turned to ashes."

"Exactly. The esteemed Lord Inquisitor Calcazar declared himself Commandant of the Koronus Expanse and sent out demands for troops he intended to requisition. He made Footfall his base of operations, which was the most logistically convenient choice. From there, his fleet has been striking throughout the Expanse, decimating the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. At the moment, he is probably all that stands in the way of the Expanse being turned to ashes."

He made Footfall his base of operations, as it was the most logistically convenient point. From there, his fleet strikes throughout the Expanse, destroying the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. He may be all that currently stands in the way of the Expanse being turned into ashes."

From there, his fleet strikes throughout the Expanse, destroying the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. He has made Footfall his base of operations, as it was the most logistically convenient point. From there, his fleet strikes throughout the Expanse, destroying the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. He may be all that currently stands in the way of the Expanse being reduced to ashes."

"Exactly. The esteemed Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has declared himself Warden of the Koronus Expanse and issued orders to requisition troops. He has made Footfall his base of operations, as it was the most logistically convenient point. From there, his fleet strikes throughout the Expanse, destroying the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. He may be all that currently stands in the way of the Expanse being reduced to ashes."

languages.text: «Exactamente. El estimado Lord Inquisidor Calcazar se ha autoproclamado guardián de la Extensión de Koronus y ha ordenado la requisa de tropas. Ha establecido su base de operaciones en Paso, ya que logísticamente era la ubicación más conveniente. Desde allí dirige a su flota en una contraofensiva por toda la Extensión para eliminar las fuerzas del Culto del Amanecer Final y a los abominables Drukhari. Tal vez sea lo único que impide que la Extensión haya sido reducida a cenizas».
languages.original_text: "Exactly. The esteemed Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has declared himself Warden of the Koronus Expanse and issued orders to requisition troops. He has made Footfall his base of operations, as it was the most logistically convenient point. From there, his fleet strikes throughout the Expanse, destroying the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. He may be all that currently stands in the way of the Expanse being reduced to ashes."

traits.locale_text: «Exactamente. El estimado Lord Inquisidor Calcazar se ha autoproclamado comandante de la Extensión de Koronus y ha ordenado la requisa de tropas. Ha establecido su base de operaciones en Paso, ya que logísticamente era la ubicación más conveniente. Desde allí dirige a su flota en una contraofensiva por toda la Extensión para eliminar las fuerzas del Culto del Amanecer Final y a los abominables Drukhari. Tal vez sea lo único que impide que la Extensión haya sido reducida a cenizas».

languages.text: “正是如此。尊敬的大审判官卡尔卡扎宣布自己为科罗努斯扩区的守护者，下令征用军队。他将指挥基地设在了落脚港，因为那里是后勤要地。他组织的舰队就从那里发起反击，努力消灭终末黎明邪教和邪恶的黑暗灵族。就目前来看，或许只有他才能阻止科罗努斯扩区灰飞烟灭。”
languages.original_text: "Exactly. The esteemed Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has declared himself Warden of the Koronus Expanse and issued orders to requisition troops. He has made Footfall his base of operations, as it was the most logistically convenient point. From there, his fleet strikes throughout the Expanse, destroying the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. He may be all that currently stands in the way of the Expanse being reduced to ashes."

traits.locale_text: “正是如此。尊敬的卡尔卡扎审判长宣布自己为科罗努斯扩区的总指挥官，下令征用军队。他将指挥基地设在了落脚港，因为那里是后勤要地。他组织的舰队就从那里发起反击，努力消灭终末黎明邪教和邪恶的黑暗灵族。就目前来看，或许只有他才能阻止科罗努斯扩区灰飞烟灭。”

languages.text: « Tout à fait. L'estimé seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar s'est proclamé gardien des Étendues de Koronus et a donné des ordres pour réquisitionner des troupes. Comme Castel est l'endroit le plus pratique d'un point de vue logistique, il en a fait sa base d'opérations. De là, sa flotte frappe dans tout le secteur pour anéantir les forces du Culte de l'Aube finale et celles des infâmes Drukharis. Il est sans doute le seul à empêcher que les Étendues soient réduites en cendres. »
languages.original_text: "Exactly. The esteemed Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has declared himself Warden of the Koronus Expanse and issued orders to requisition troops. He has made Footfall his base of operations, as it was the most logistically convenient point. From there, his fleet strikes throughout the Expanse, destroying the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. He may be all that currently stands in the way of the Expanse being reduced to ashes."

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait. L'estimé seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar s'est proclamé commandant des Étendues de Koronus et a donné des ordres pour réquisitionner des troupes. Comme Castel est l'endroit le plus pratique d'un point de vue logistique, il en a fait sa base d'opérations. De là, sa flotte frappe dans tout le secteur pour anéantir les forces du Culte de l'Aube finale et celles des infâmes Drukharis. Il est sans doute le seul à empêcher que les Étendues soient réduites en cendres. »

languages.text: 「その通りです。敬愛されるロード・インクィジター・カルカサルは、コロヌス・エクスパンスの所長であることを宣言し、軍隊を徴発する命令を出しました。彼はフットフォールを作戦拠点としました。そこから彼の艦隊はエクスパンス全域を攻撃し、最後の夜明け魔女団と忌まわしきデュカーリの勢力を壊滅させるのです。彼は現在、エクスパンスが灰と化そうとするあらゆるものを阻む者なのかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Exactly. The esteemed Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has declared himself Warden of the Koronus Expanse and issued orders to requisition troops. He has made Footfall his base of operations, as it was the most logistically convenient point. From there, his fleet strikes throughout the Expanse, destroying the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. He may be all that currently stands in the way of the Expanse being reduced to ashes."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです。敬愛されるロード・インクィジター・カルカサルは、コロヌス・エクスパンスの司令官であることを宣言し、軍隊を徴発する命令を出しました。彼はフットフォールを作戦拠点としました。そこから彼の艦隊はエクスパンス全域を攻撃し、最後の夜明け魔女団と忌まわしきデュカーリの勢力を壊滅させるのです。彼は現在、エクスパンスが灰と化そうとするあらゆるものを阻む者なのかもしれません」

languages.text: "Ganz genau. Der verehrte Großinquisitor Calcazar hat sich selbst zum Wachtmeister der Koronus-Ausdehnung ernannt und Befehle erteilt, um Truppen zu requirieren. Er hat Footfall zu seiner Operationsbasis erklärt, da es der logistisch praktischste Punkt war. Von dort aus führt seine Flotte Angriffe in der gesamten Ausdehnung aus und zerstört die Truppen des Kults der letzten Dämmerung und die widerwärtigen Drukhari. Er ist womöglich das Einzige, was verhindert, dass die Ausdehnung in Asche verwandelt wird."
languages.original_text: "Exactly. The esteemed Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has declared himself Warden of the Koronus Expanse and issued orders to requisition troops. He has made Footfall his base of operations, as it was the most logistically convenient point. From there, his fleet strikes throughout the Expanse, destroying the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. He may be all that currently stands in the way of the Expanse being reduced to ashes."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz genau. Der verehrte Großinquisitor Calcazar hat sich selbst zum Kommandanten der Koronus-Ausdehnung ernannt und Befehle erteilt, um Truppen zu requirieren. Er hat Footfall zu seiner Operationsbasis erklärt, da es der logistisch praktischste Punkt war. Von dort aus führt seine Flotte Angriffe in der gesamten Ausdehnung aus und zerstört die Truppen des Kults der letzten Dämmerung und die widerwärtigen Drukhari. Er ist womöglich das Einzige, was verhindert, dass die Ausdehnung in Asche verwandelt wird."

languages.text: "Evet. Saygıdeğer Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar, kendisini Koronus Enginliği'nin Koruyucusu olarak ilan etti ve istek birliklerine emirler gönderdi. Faaliyet üssü olarak lojistik açıdan daha uygun olması sebebiyle Binliman'ı belirledi. Filosu buradan çıkarak tüm Enginlik'e ulaşarak Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın kuvvetlerini ve menfur Drukharileri yok etti. Enginlik'in tozla duman olmasının önünde duran tek kişi o olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Exactly. The esteemed Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has declared himself Warden of the Koronus Expanse and issued orders to requisition troops. He has made Footfall his base of operations, as it was the most logistically convenient point. From there, his fleet strikes throughout the Expanse, destroying the forces of the Cult of the Final Dawn and the abominable Drukhari. He may be all that currently stands in the way of the Expanse being reduced to ashes."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Saygıdeğer Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar, kendisini Koronus Enginliği'nin Koruyucusu olarak ilan etti ve istek birliklerine emirler gönderdi. Faaliyet üssü olarak lojistik açıdan daha uygun olması sebebiyle Binliman'ı belirledi. Filosu buradan çıkarak tüm Enginlik'e ulaşarak Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın kuvvetlerini ve menfur Drukharileri yok etti. Enginlik'in tozla duman olmasının önünde duran tek kişi o olabilir."
